title: Egg Company Fined $7 Million Over Salmonella Outbreak
teaser: Owners of the egg producer have pleaded guilty to bribing a public official and selling eggs contaminated with salmonella.
contentencoded:
Owners of one of the nation’s largest egg producers, Iowa-based Quality Egg LLC, have pleaded guilty to bribing a public official and selling eggs contaminated with salmonella.

David Plunkett, senior attorney with the Food Safety Program at the non-partisan Center for Science in the Public Interest, discusses the story with Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson.

Guest

  • David Plunkett, senior attorney with the Food Safety Program at the non-partisan Center for Science in the Public Interest.
